body_html: I ran the code on CPUs for several days and I haven't observed this issue until now. Note that since training on CPUs is extremely slow, I have only trained for 20 epochs, so it may be too early to draw a conclusion with a high confidence, but it seems less likely that this issue repros on CPUs.

body: I ran the code on CPUs for several days and I haven't observed this issue until now. Note that since training on CPUs is extremely slow, I have only trained for 20 epochs, so it may be too early to draw a conclusion with a high confidence, but it seems less likely that this issue repros on CPUs.
